Mr, Cecil S. Bidlack

14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Sir:
We are pleased to enclose the Ampex Bulletin A-205 describing
the Model 300 Magnetic Tape Recorder, as discussed in our
telephone conversation of this date.
Various models of the 300 Series Recorder and accessories are
available as follows:
